titles.title: Honoring Service Through National Park Access Act
Honoring Service Through National Park Access Act
A bill to make the National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass available at a discount to veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Honoring Service Through National Park Access Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to make a lifetime National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass available, at a cost of $10, to veterans who were separated from military service under conditions other than dishonorable.
